EmailTemplate.description: All the account team members must be notified automatically when a Service Recovery report status is changed.
EmailTemplate.name: SRR - Email notification to Account team members on status change
EmailTemplate.subject: Service Recovery Report with # {!Account.SRR_Name__c} has been updated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Account Team Member,
The Service Recovery Report #{!Account.SRR_Name__c}status has been updated for the {!Account.Name} Account.
Click on the below link to view details: {!Account.For_Template_SRR_link__c}
Thank you, we appreciate your support!
